original_text: (And this taxing was first made when Cyrenius was governor of Syria.)
korean_text: 이 호적은 구레뇨가 수리아 총독이 되었을 때에 처음 한 것이라

sentences.original_text: And this taxing was first made
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 이 세금 징수는 처음으로 행해졌다

sentences.original_text: when Cyrenius was governor of Syria
